meanings.definition: A key that opens a lock without requiring a specific code or combination.
meanings.sent1: The passkey unlocked the door effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: I always keep my house passkey in my pocket.
meanings.sent3: The passkey seemed to have a magical touch, opening every door it touched.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the passkey to his heart, unlocking a flood of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The shiny passkey gleamed in the sunlight, promising access to hidden treasures.

meanings.definition: A password or code used to access a restricted area or system.
meanings.sent1: Remember to keep your passkey safe and secure.
meanings.sent2: I had to reset my online passkey after forgetting it.
meanings.sent3: The passkey to the secret club was 'pineapple', which always made me hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the passkey that brightened up the room, unlocking smiles all around.
meanings.sent5: The passkey to success is hard work and determination, not luck alone.
